item.title: Introduction to Ōhanga Pai
item.description: These are raw journal entries. An Ōhanga Pai hackers journal. For specific content articles in chapter format see Philosophy or Theory . We’ve got a few projects on-the-go. Asset exchange models (Drăgulescu–Ispolatov–Yakovenko models) Keen–Goodwin models in python (pymsky project) Job Guarantee models in the Keen–Goodwin framework. Econometric analysis of the central bank interest rate policy — are interest rate hikes inflationary in the short run? (Interest–income and forward pricing channels overwhelm the propensity to save/borrow discriminants).
